definitions.definition: A layer of impurities that accumulates at the surface of a liquid (especially molten metal or water).
examples: During smelting, scum rises to the surface and is then removed by the smelter.

definitions.definition: A greenish water vegetation (such as algae ), usually found floating on the surface of ponds
examples: These organisms form scum in large quantities.

definitions.definition: The topmost liquid layer of a cesspool or septic tank .

examples: People who sell used-up pens are scum , just total low-lives.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A layer of impurities that accumulates at the surface of a liquid (especially molten metal or water).
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) A greenish water vegetation (such as algae ), usually found floating on the surface of ponds
The topmost liquid layer of a cesspool or septic tank .
( derogatory , slang ) A reprehensible person or persons.
